                     throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                            java.security.KeyStoreException
        Parameters:
        keystore -
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - couldn't get default algorithm from configured TrustManagerFactory, or there were no configured trust managers returned by it
        java.security.KeyStoreException - problem initializing the configured TrustManagerFactory object

    • Method Detail

      • allowSelfsignedSSLCertificates

        public static void allowSelfsignedSSLCertificates(java.net.URLConnection urlConnection)
                                           throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                  java.security.KeyStoreException,
                                                  java.security.KeyManagementException
        Run a URLConnection object through this method in order to allow it to accept self-signed SSL certificates.
        Parameters:
        urlConnection - the URLConnection object to modify
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if SSL (TLS) algorithm not configured properly or EasyX509TrustManager object could not be instantiated
        java.security.KeyStoreException - EasyX509TrustManager object could not be instantiated
        java.security.KeyManagementException - SSLContext could not be initialized

      • setVerboseFlag

        public void setVerboseFlag(boolean flag)
        Parameters:
        flag - true if to set "verbose" mode on, wherein class will print interesting stuff to stdout as it works
